name: REx The Chicken
description:
An alien parasite has struck earth and has taken hold of earths population. For you, REx the Chicken, the virus has given sentience and strength long lost. Destroy all those infected, as the last living chicken on the planet!

Controls
----------
Movement - wasd and arrow keys

Fire Weapon: left mouse button

Switch Weapon: space bar

Restart: r

-------- Website --------
https://www.littlepuggames.com/
